title: ATAC summary metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for processing metrics of an ATAC-seq library

median_fragments_per_cell.title: Median fragments per cell
median_fragments_per_cell.description: Among barcodes identified as cells, the median number of fragments per barcode.

median_per_cell_total_library_complexity.title: Median per cell total library complexity
median_per_cell_total_library_complexity.description: Estimated median per cell library complexity

median_per_cell_unique_fragments_at_5000.title: Median per cell unique fragments at 50000 RRPC
median_per_cell_unique_fragments_at_5000.description: Median unique fragments per cell after downsampling to 50K raw reads per cell

median_per_cell_unique_fragments_at_3000.title: Median per cell unique fragments at 30000 RRPC
median_per_cell_unique_fragments_at_3000.description: Median unique fragments per cell after downsampling to 30K raw reads per cell

frac_cut_fragments_in_peaks.title: Fraction of cut sites in peaks
frac_cut_fragments_in_peaks.desciption: Fraction of transposition events in peaks

frac_fragments_nfr.title: Fraction of fragments nfr
frac_fragments_nfr.description: Fraction of fragments in nucleosome-free regions (with size smaller than 147 basepairs)

frac_fragments_nuc.title: Fraction of fragments nuc
frac_fragments_nuc.description: Fraction of fragments flanking a single nucleosome (with size between 147 and 294 basepairs)

frac_fragments_nfr_or_nuc.title: Fraction of fragments nfr or nuc
frac_fragments_nfr_or_nuc.description: Fraction of fragments in nucleosome-free or single-nucleosome regions

frac_fragments_overlapping_targets.title: Fraction of fragments overlapping targets
frac_fragments_overlapping_targets.description: The fraction of fragments (that passed all filters) overlapping targeted regions (transcription start sites, DNase hypersensitive regions, enhancer or promoter regions, as present in the reference)

frac_fragments_overlapping_peaks.title: Fraction of fragments overlapping peaks
frac_fragments_overlapping_peaks.description: The fraction of fragments (that passed all filters) overlapping the set of peaks called for the library.

tss_enrichment_score.title: Tss enrichment score
tss_enrichment_score.description: The TSS profile is the summed accessibility signal (defined as number of cut sites per base) in a window of 2,000 bases around all the annotated TSSs, normalized by the minimum signal in the window. This metric reports the maximum value in the profile

bc_q30_bases_fract.title: Fraction of barcode q30 bases
bc_q30_bases_fract.description: Fraction of Q30 bases in barcode read

r1_q30_bases_fract.title: Fraction of R1 q30 bases
r1_q30_bases_fract.desciption: Fraction of Q30 bases in Read 1

r2_q30_bases_fract.title: Fraction of R2 q30 bases
r2_q30_bases_fract.description: Fraction of Q30 bases in Read 2

si_q30_bases_fract.title: Fraction of sample index q30 bases
si_q30_bases_fract.description: Fraction of Q30 bases in Sample Index

frac_waste_no_barcode.title: Fraction of invalid barcode read pairs
frac_waste_no_barcode.description: Fraction of read pairs with invalid barcodes

frac_waste_overall_nondup.title: Fraction of overall nondup read pairs
frac_waste_overall_nondup.description: Fraction of total read pairs that are non-duplicate and wasted read pairs

frac_waste_non_cell_barcode.title: Fraction of non-cell barcode read pairs
frac_waste_non_cell_barcode.description: Fraction of total read pairs in non-cell barcodes

frac_waste_chimeric.title: Fraction of chimeric read pairs
frac_waste_chimeric.description: Fraction of total read pairs that are improper pairs or map to a supplementary contig and are in cell barcodes

frac_waste_mitochondrial.title: Fraction of mitochondrial read pairs
frac_waste_mitochondrial.description: Fraction of all the sequenced read pairs that come from cell barcodes and map to the mitochondrial genome.

frac_waste_unmapped.title: Fraction of unmapped read pairs
frac_waste_unmapped.description: Fraction of all the sequenced read pairs that come from cell barcodes and could not be mapped to the genome with confidence.

frac_waste_lowmapq.title: Fraction of lowmapq read pairs
frac_waste_lowmapq.description: Fraction of total read pairs that have low mapping quality and are in cell barcodes.

frac_waste_duplicate.title: Fraction of duplicate read pairs
frac_waste_duplicate.description: Fraction of all the sequenced read pairs that come from cell barcodes and are deemed to be PCR duplicates due to alignment to the same genomic position as another read pair in the library.

frac_waste_total.title: Fraction of total wasted read pairs
frac_waste_total.description: Fraction of total read pairs wasted (either have invalid barcodes or in non cell barcodes, or did not pass filters).

total_usable_fragments.title: Total usable fragments
total_usable_fragments.description: Total number of read pairs in cell barcodes passing all filters.

frac_mapped_confidently.title: Fraction of mapped confidently read pairs
frac_mapped_confidently.description: Fraction of all the sequenced read pairs that mapped to the genome with high mapping quality (>30 mapq). Includes unique and duplicate read pairs from any barcode

num_fragments.title: Number of fragments
num_fragments.description: Total number of read pairs that were assigned to this library in demultiplexing.

cells_detected.title: Cells detected
cells_detected.description: The total number of barcodes identified as cells
